teams.name: Mini Pre-Team
teams.description: For young girls who demonstrate strength, a desire to learn, and a strong ability to focus. This is a pre-competitive team program. Students progress to either Pre-Team or Intro Team at age 7, depending on their progress.

teams.name: Pre-Team
teams.description: Students in the Pre-Team program learn the skills necessary to progress to competition Level 3.

teams.name: Junior Team
teams.description: This team is for younger gymnasts who have mastered Level 3 skills and routines.  Enrollment is by coach recommendation and qualifying level 3 meet score only.

teams.name: Senior Team
teams.description: This team is for gymnasts ages 10 & above who have mastered Level 3 skills and routines and are dedicated and focused.  Enrollment is by coach recommendation and qualifying level 3 meet score only.
